% Define your quote and author for the epigraph here

\newcommand{\yourQuote}{It is my belief that nearly any invented quotation, played with confidence, \\stands a good chance to deceive.}
\newcommand{\yourAuthor}{Mark Twain}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
% Do not edit these lines unless you wish to customize
% the template
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\begin{titlepage}
\begin{center}

\begin{singlespacing}
\vspace*{\fill}
\yourQuote\\
\hfill---\textit{\yourAuthor}
\vspace*{\fill}
\end{singlespacing}

\end{center}
\end{titlepage}
